item.title: House Republican enters race for Mitch McConnell's Senate seat, setting up high-stakes GOP primary
item.description: Rep. Andy Barr is jumping into the race to replace retiring Sen. Mitch McConnell in the November 2026 elections.

item.title: Trump backs Republican rivals in Arizona governor's race after Rep. Biggs enters contest: 'I had a problem'
item.description: Two Republican candidates in the 2026 Arizona governor's race have both been endorsed by President Donald Trump, he announced on Monday.
